statements: SELECT * FROM insurance_claims;
SELECT claim_id, claim_date, claim_amount FROM insurance_claims WHERE claim_type = 'Car';
SELECT claim_id, policy_number, claim_amount FROM insurance_claims ORDER BY claim_amount DESC;
SELECT MAX(claim_amount) AS max_claim_amount FROM insurance_claims;
SELECT AVG(claim_amount) AS avg_claim_amount, COUNT(*) AS total_claims FROM insurance_claims WHERE claim_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM insurance_claims WHERE claim_type='Car' ORDER BY claim_date DESC
SELECT claim_id, policy_number, claim_amount FROM insurance_claims WHERE claim_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31'
SELECT claim_id, policy_number, claim_date, claim_type FROM insurance_claims WHERE claim_amount > 5000 ORDER BY claim_amount ASC
SELECT * FROM insurance_claims WHERE claim_type='Home' ORDER BY claim_amount DESC
SELECT claim_id, claim_date, claim_type, claim_amount FROM insurance_claims WHERE claim_amount < 1000
SELECT * FROM insurance_claims;
SELECT claim_type, claim_amount FROM insurance_claims WHERE claim_date = '2023-01-15';
SELECT claim_id, claim_type FROM insurance_claims ORDER BY claim_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM claim_frequency WHERE claim_type = 'medical' ORDER BY claim_frequency DESC;
SELECT claim_type, AVG(claim_amount) AS avg_claim_amount FROM insurance_claims GROUP BY claim_type;
SELECT * FROM insurance_claims WHERE claim_id = 100;
SELECT claim_type, claim_date FROM insurance_claims WHERE claim_amount > 5000 ORDER BY claim_date DESC;
SELECT claim_id, claim_type, claim_amount FROM insurance_claims WHERE claim_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT claim_type, SUM(claim_amount) AS total_claim_amount FROM insurance_claims GROUP BY claim_type HAVING total_claim_amount > 10000;
SELECT ic.claim_type, cf.claim_frequency FROM insurance_claims ic JOIN claim_frequency cf ON ic.claim_type = cf.claim_type ORDER BY cf.claim_frequency DESC;
SELECT * FROM insurance_claims;
SELECT claim_id, claim_date, claim_amount, claim_type FROM insurance_claims;
SELECT claimant_name, claimant_address FROM claimants;
SELECT assessor_name, specialty FROM claim_assessors;
SELECT * FROM insurance_claims WHERE claim_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM insurance_claims ORDER BY claim_amount DESC, claim_date ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT claim_id, claim_type FROM insurance_claims WHERE claim_date > '2022-01-01' AND claim_amount > 1000;
SELECT c.claimant_name, ca.specialty FROM claimants c JOIN claim_assessors ca ON c.claimant_id = ca.assessor_id;
SELECT * FROM insurance_claims WHERE claim_type LIKE 'Car%' OR claim_type LIKE '%Health%';
SELECT assessor_name, specialty, AVG(rating) AS avg_rating FROM claim_assessors GROUP BY specialty HAVING avg_rating > 4 ORDER BY avg_rating DESC;
SELECT * FROM insurance_claims;
SELECT policyholder_name, policyholder_age FROM policyholders WHERE policyholder_age > 30;
SELECT claim_id, claim_type, amount FROM insurance_claims ORDER BY amount DESC;
SELECT company_name, company_location FROM insurance_companies WHERE company_type = 'Insurance';
SELECT claim_id, claim_status, claim_date FROM claim_history WHERE claim_status = 'Approved';
SELECT * FROM insurance_claims WHERE policy_number = 12345;
SELECT claim_id, claim_type, amount FROM insurance_claims WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT company_name, company_location FROM insurance_companies WHERE company_type = 'Health';
SELECT policyholder_name, policyholder_age, policyholder_address FROM policyholders WHERE policyholder_age BETWEEN 25 AND 40;
SELECT ch.claim_id, ch.claim_date, ch.claim_status, ic.company_name FROM claim_history ch JOIN insurance_companies ic ON ch.claim_id = ic.company_id;
SELECT * FROM insurance_claims;
SELECT claim_id, claim_type, claim_amount FROM insurance_claims WHERE claim_amount > 1000;
SELECT policyholder_name, policy_start_date, policy_end_date FROM policyholders ORDER BY policy_start_date DESC;
SELECT assessor_name, assessor_department FROM claim_assessors WHERE assessor_department = 'Claims';
SELECT claim_id, status, claim_resolution_date FROM claim_status WHERE status = 'Approved';
SELECT * FROM insurance_claims ORDER BY claim_date DESC;
SELECT policyholder_name, claim_amount, claim_date FROM policyholders INNER JOIN insurance_claims ON policyholders.policy_id = insurance_claims.policy_id WHERE claim_amount > 1000;
SELECT claim_id, claim_type, payment_amount FROM insurance_claims LEFT JOIN claim_payments ON insurance_claims.claim_id = claim_payments.claim_id WHERE claim_payments.payment_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT assessor_name, assessor_department FROM claim_assessors WHERE assessor_id IN (SELECT assessor_id FROM claim_payments WHERE payment_amount > 500);
SELECT status, COUNT(claim_id) AS total_claims FROM claim_status GROUP BY status ORDER BY total_claims DESC;
